pr_title: Add validation check about websocket path

timeline.message:
Add validation check about websocket path

Motivation:

I add websocket handler in custom server with netty.

I first add WebSocketServerProtocolHandler in my channel pipeline.

It does work! but I found that it can pass "/websocketabc". (websocketPath is "/websocket")

Modification:
`isNotWebSocketPath()` method of `WebSocketServerProtocolHandshakeHandler`

Result:
It can pass not "/websocketabc" but "/websocket".

timeline.bodyText: req.uri() could be moved to a variable.
timeline.author: doom369

timeline.bodyText: All this should be done only in case of serverConfig.checkStartsWith(). In all other cases, we don't need to perform those checks.
timeline.author: doom369

replies.bodyText: So..what should I do? That logic could be moved to new method?
replies.author: Doyuni

replies.bodyText:
Probably own method makes sense as it became big enough.
Also, I think it would make sense to rename isNotWebSocketPath to isWebSocketPath. It's a generic Java way. When NO is required you can use !isWebSocketPath().
replies.author: doom369

replies.bodyText:
Thank you for your kind explanation.
I'll change it based on your reference.
replies.author: Doyuni
